thread.title: Changes afoot as Alliance Trust looks for a lift
thread.title_full: Changes afoot as Alliance Trust looks for a lift

title: Changes afoot as Alliance Trust looks for a lift
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Changes afoot as Alliance Trust looks for a lift Katherine Garrett-Cox admits Alliance has underperformed Ruben Sprich/Reuters Katherine Garrett-Cox admits Alliance has underperformed Ruben Sprich/Reuters Harry Wilson Published 1 minute ago 
Alliance Trust said that it was prepared to push through further changes after turning in a poor set of six-month figures that were outclassed by rivals. 
Britain’s second-largest investment trust, based in Dundee, admitted that the first half of the year had been particularly challenging and that it would announce measures in the autumn aimed at turning round the company. 
Alliance said that it had made a return on its investments of only 2.7 per cent in the six months to the end of June, less than half the 5.32 per cent return of Scottish Mortgage, a rival, highlighting its Subscribe now
